definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: an ingredient of the holy incense, + [[נׇטָף]], [[חֶלְבְּנׇה]], Ex 30:34; LXX Vulgate o)/nuc, onyx (whence AV onycha), i.e. unguis odoratus, the operculum, or closing-flap, of certain molluscs, with pungent odour when burnt, v. Thes:1388 f. Di Shipley-Cook:Ency. Bib. ONYCHA; so most; KG Jacob:ZMG xliii (1889), 354 prop. amber.
